idea-plugin.name: Falcon Relax Eyes Theme
idea-plugin.description:
If you work in a bright environment for long periods of time, a light-colored theme is recommended.
Falcon Relax Eyes theme might be a better choice for you.

在明亮的工作环境中，长时间使用 IDEA，建议使用浅色主题，减少视觉疲劳。
Falcon Relax Eyes Theme 可能是个更好的选择。

Report an issue
Dark or white color theme is better for the eyes?
